original_text: People who have helped you to fight will push you out from your country. They will tell you what is not true. You will believe them. They will be stronger than you because you will believe their words. They will make a trap for you.’ People who have helped you to fight will push you out from your country. They will tell you what is not true. You will believe them. They will be stronger than you because you will believe their words. They will make a trap for you.’ People who have helped you to fight
korean_text: 너와 약조한 모든 자들이 다 너를 쫓아 변경에 이르게 하며 너와 화목하던 자들이 너를 속여 이기며 네 먹을 것을 먹는 자들이 네 아래에 함정을 파니 네 마음에 지각이 없음이로다

sentences.original_text: People who have helped you to fight
will push you out from your country
They will tell you what is not true
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거짓된 것을 네게 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will be stronger than you
because you will believe their words
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너는 그들의 말을 믿을 것이기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They will make a trap for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 위해 덫을 만들 것이다

because you will believe their words
